secure_all_items_and_close_drawer.description: Ensure that all items inside the drawer are securely placed and close the drawer.

wipe_and_close_drawer.description: Wipe inside the drawer for dust and close it.

secure_opened_drawer.description: Ensure that the opened drawer is securely in place.

wipe_inside_drawer.description: Wipe inside the opened drawer to remove any dust or debris.

close_and_press_drawer.description: Close the drawer and then press it to make sure it is securely closed.

close_drawer.description: Push the drawer to close it.

clean_drawer.description: Wipe the drawer while it is open to remove any dust or debris.

close_and_clean_drawer.description: First, close the drawer and then clean the drawer face.

slide_drawer_out.description: Slide the closed drawer out to open it.

check_drawer.description: Check whether the contents are secure in the closed drawer.

slide_out_wipe_and_slide_in_drawer.description: Slide out the drawer, wipe it clean inside and then slide it back in.

pull_drawer.description: Pull the drawer to open it.

press_drawer.description: Press the closed drawer to make sure it is securely in place.

open_wipe_and_close_drawer.description: Open the drawer, wipe it clean, and then close it.

open_drawer.description: Pull the drawer handle to open it.

open_and_clean_drawer.description: First, open the drawer and then clean the drawer inside.

clean_drawer_and_furniture_surface.description: Clean both the drawer and furniture surface.

slide_out_drawer_clean_and_slide_in.description: Slide out the drawer, wipe its inside and then slide it back in.

complete_all_cleaning.description: Complete all cleaning tasks: Open the drawer, wipe it, close it and clean the furniture body.

open_and_close_drawer.description: Open the drawer, check the contents and close it.

wipe_furniture_surface.description: Wipe the surface of the furniture body to clean it.

open_drawer_wipe_and_close.description: Open the drawer, clean it, and then close it.

clean_entire_furniture.description: Clean the entire furniture, including drawer and body.

clean_and_press_furniture_surface.description: Clean the surface of the furniture and press it to ensure it is dust-free.

clean_furniture_body.description: Clean the furniture body to remove any dirt or dust.

complete_all_tasks.description: Complete all tasks including: Open the drawer, clean the drawer inside and its face, and clean the furniture body.

clean_whole_furniture.description: Clean the whole furniture including body and drawer.

clean_body.description: Clean the furniture body to remove dust or any particles.
